mapper.select: SELECT o.cardserial, o.outparking_id, o.carnumber, o.outtime, o.outtype, o.carnumberout, o.intime, o.addtime, o.parking_id FROM outparking AS o LEFT JOIN car_owner_car AS C ON o.carnumber = C.carnumber WHERE o.carnumber IN ( SELECT carnumber FROM member_car_ref AS M INNER JOIN car_owner_car AS C ON M."car_id" = C.car_id WHERE M.member_id =#{Member_id} ) LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{Size}
